data.title: Music from Jackass: The TV Show
data.meta_description: Music from Jackass: The TV Show Important: The music on this list is from the original US versions of each episode and vary from country to country. I live in the UK myself and already know that it...
data.text:
Jay // 28

(SHE/THEY)

Jackass blog since 2012, I make gifs and I try to post rare content to keep the community active.

Feel free to send me asks and engage with my posts!

Remember, reblogging keeps the community active!! <3

Important: The music on this list is from the original US versions of each episode and vary from country to country. I live in the UK myself and already know that it was different music in the skits, but I only have the US episodes, therefore, could only make a list based on the music in the version I watched.

_______________Season 1:_______________

Listen to my Playlist for this Season: Youtube // Spotify (Some songs missing in spotify)

.

Episode 1 - Poo Cocktail

Opening: Minutemen - Corona

Johnny Coxville: The Pointer Sisters - I’m so excited

Steve-O’s no hands shot: Spirit of America Ensemble - Carrying the Torch

Self Defense: Jerry Douglas, V.M. Bhatt & Edgar Meyer - Mississippi Mud

Body in the Trunk: X-Ray Spex - Oh Bondage, Up yours!

Shopping Carts: CKY - 96 Quite Bitter Beings

Oompa Loompa Skateboarding: Oompa Loompa Remix - Unknown Artist

Daddy & Baby: Funsters - Fractured Fairies

Fat Fucks: Fat Boys - Fat Boys

Credits: Minutemen - Corona
